org.jetel.graph.runtime

Class GraphRuntimeContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.GraphRuntimeContext

  • public class GraphRuntimeContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Common used implementation of IGraphRuntimeContext interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GraphRuntimeContext.PropertyKey
      This enum is attempt to provide a more generic way to this runtime configuration.

      • getRuntimeClassPath

        public java.net.URL[] getRuntimeClassPath()
        This classpath is extension of 'current' classpath used for loading extra classes specified inside the graph. Each component with transformation class specified (attribute transformClass or generatorClass etc.) will use this class-paths to find it.

      • setRuntimeClassPath

        public void setRuntimeClassPath(java.net.URL[] runtimeClassPath)

      • getCompileClassPath

        public java.net.URL[] getCompileClassPath()
        This classpath is extension of 'current' classpath used in compile time of java code specified inside the graph.

      • setCompileClassPath

        public void setCompileClassPath(java.net.URL[] compileClassPath)

      • getClassPath

        public CloverClassPath getClassPath()
        Returns:
        classpath container for both for runtime classpath and for compile classpath
        See Also:
        CloverClassPath

      • isSynchronizedRun

        public boolean isSynchronizedRun()
        'Synchronized' mode currently means that the watchdog between phases waits for an JMX event, which allows next graph processing. Future interpretation could be different.
        Returns:
        true if graph is running in 'synchronized mode'

      • setSynchronizedRun

        public void setSynchronizedRun(boolean synchronizedRun)

      • isTransactionMode

        public boolean isTransactionMode()
        Transaction mode means that all graph elements should not affect none of their output resources until postExecute with COMMIT statement is invoked.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        IGraphElement#postExecute(org.jetel.graph.TransactionMethod), TransactionMethod

      • setTransactionMode

        public void setTransactionMode(boolean transactionMode)

        Returns:
        true if token tracking is enabled

      • isFastPropagateExecution

        public boolean isFastPropagateExecution()
        Returns:
        the flag which indicates the subgraph is executed in fast-propagated mode, which is used only for subgraphs in loops, where is necessary to have all edges fast-propagating.

      • setFastPropagateExecution

        public void setFastPropagateExecution(boolean fastPropagateExecution)
        Sets the flag which indicates the subgraph is executed in fast-propagate mode, which is used only for subgraphs in loops, where is necessary to have all edges fast-propagating.
        Parameters:
        fastPropagateExecution -
